name: The Walls of Bratock
summary: Long time friends are now fighting each other, accusing each other of starting the war. A strange dream led you to the Island, and now you feel it is your destiny to prevent a bloodshed! Explore the HUGE Island of Bratock, visit more than 10 multi-level towns, villages and keeps, roam more than 30 HUGE dungeon levels, fight hordes of monsters, speak with dozens of people, all that in incredible 256-color VGA graphics.
